subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: When the Colorado’s assistant coach Aisha Veasley tore her Achilles’ tendon last month, Ann Strother, the team’s director of operations, temporarily took on some of her duties.
snippet: When the Colorado’s assistant coach Aisha Veasley tore her Achilles’ tendon last month, Ann Strother, the team’s director of operations, temporarily took on some of her duties.
